intro: Epinetrum, commonly known as the star-of-Bethlehem, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asparagaceae. It is native to the Mediterranean region and is characterized by its attractive, star-shaped white flowers that bloom in spring. It prefers well-drained soil and full sun to partial shade.
